options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    SUM(throughput), sourceNodeName, destinationNodeName
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter

GROUP BY sourceNodeName, destinationNodeName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    SUM(throughput), sourceNodeName, destinationNodeName
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1639007546) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1639009346)

GROUP BY sourceNodeName, destinationNodeName

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    SUM(reverseThroughput), 
    (sourceNodeName, destinationNodeName) as pair
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
AND sourceNodeName != ''
AND destinationNodeName != ''

GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    SUM(reverseThroughput), 
    (sourceNodeName, destinationNodeName) as pair
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641780996) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641782796)
AND sourceNodeName != ''
AND destinationNodeName != ''

GROUP BY pair

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    AVG(sourceThroughput),
    sourceNodeName
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
AND sourceNodeName != ''
AND destinationNodeName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    sourceNodeName,
    t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    AVG(sourceThroughput),
    sourceNodeName
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641844754) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641846554)
AND sourceNodeName != ''
AND destinationNodeName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    sourceNodeName,
    t
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Throughput of Node Acting as Source

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

    $timeSeries as t,

FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641835745) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641837545)
AND sourceNodeName != ''

AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY

    t
ORDER BY t

AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'

AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'
